name: PaperjamAvenger
description:
You are Griffin who works as tech support at work.

Your boss needs you to avenge the printers!

Your mission is to eliminate users who have caused paper jam in the printers.

Just look for printer error messages on their screen and destroy the guilty beings !!!

Compatibility

x86_64 , x86_32 are the only computer architectures that i have built the game for.

In linux , you will play the game using the vulkan renderer support with ease than in windows in some graphics cards. WE OWE EVERYTHING TO OPENSOURCE .


If the downloaded windows version game throws a vulkan device error message , just come again and read this chart below .

You will mostly need a version of the game with opengl renderer support instead of vulkan because your gpu hardware provider did not implement vulkan support on the driver(s) they provided.

What files should I get? I see too many files in the download section



How to Install

Windows - extract the zip file in 7zip or winrar and launch the game by double clicking the game shortcut found in the extracted game folder.

Linux - extract the downloaded zip file using the CLI(unzip tool) or GUI (right click > extract here).

You launch the game by using CLI or GUI too.

On CLI Assuming you have extracted the binary app image , and set execute permissions ,

use the syntax :

"path of binary app image" (without quotes)

OR

./"insert name of binary app image"  (without quotes)

(assuming you are on the current directory of the binary app image)

and finally press enterkey to launch the game.

On GUI just launch the game by left clicking. If the binary app image needs execution permission , you can be prompted to mark it as executable in most linux distros
